body: When prompted to 'choose a target' which includes a player, or solely a player, the green highlight on a player's icon isn't removed until your next turn.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Choose Target Player Highlight

comments.body: It would be *really* helpful if you could provide a card name, deck or test I could use so I don't have to go hunting in order to replicate. Thanks.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body:
Well, a card search for 'target' and 'player' would do the trick. ;)

Here's a test deck, just make sure sensible choices are turned off.

# 3 creatures
4 Acolyte of Xathrid
4 Bile Urchin
4 Boggart Forager

# 3 spells
4 Barrage of Expendables
4 Blaze
4 Burst Lightning

# 2 lands
8 Mountain
8 Swamp
